Name: CorbomiteProtocol
DisplayDescription:
Combat Start: Become Invulnerable for 6 seconds and gain <Grit>30</> <Grit>Mitigation</>.

<Italic>Invulnerable: Cannot receive damage.</>

<Italic>Mitigation: Reduces incoming damage by a flat value.</>

Description.Format:
Combat Start: Become Invulnerable for {Duration} seconds and gain <Grit>{MitigationVal}</> <Grit>Mitigation</>.

<Italic>Invulnerable: Cannot receive damage.</>

<Italic>Mitigation: Reduces incoming damage by a flat value.</>

DisplayDescriptionNormalized:
Combat Start: Become Invulnerable for 6 seconds and gain 30 Mitigation.

Invulnerable: Cannot receive damage.

Mitigation: Reduces incoming damage by a flat value.
